"...Ah, you've returned.": "But... without Zephetto, it seems."
"Could you tell me what happened?"

"Just as Zephetto's consciousness was being
transferred into... um, the 4th clone's body..."
"Something ended up seizing control of the body."
"...As ever, things beyond our imagination just keep happening..."
"...What happened next...?"
"...Agh, it's be so much easier if Zephetto were here to explain things..."
"I can't speak for long, but..."
"Huh?"
"I will at least tell you about what that \"something\" was."
"...Faria?"
"Wait, Zephetto?"
"...It's me."
"Zephetto?"
"Right."
"His name is Vael."
"Dark Falz-class Starless are beings that can control a great deal of Starless."
"Among them, Vael is able to control even the Dark Falz-class Starless."
"You could say he is the \"king\" of Starless."
"My mind will soon be completely taken over by him."

"I transfered a portion of my consciousness
to Faria before that happens."

"As my mind has been merging with Vael's, I have
come to understand what it means to be Starless."
"They are constantly starving."
"They continually wander the endless cosmos in search of Photons."

"500 years ago, during a state of extreme starvation, they picked
up the faintest trace of Photon energy and appeared before us."
"And they devoured us all."
"That's when they realized it."

"They realized that what they were
eating contained far too few Photons."

"At the same time, they realized the sheer abundance
of Photons of which the ancient ARKS were possessed."
"That's when Vael decided to... just wait."

"He figured all they had to do was wait for their prey
to get stronger; to fatten up on a buffet of Photons."
"Vael then issued a command to all Starless."

"Obeying his command, the Starless immediately stopped their attack,
departed into a separate dimension, and vanished from our region of space."
"Vael, on the other hand..."
"Laid dormant within my body, as I was in the middle of battle."

"It turns out my ability to transfer my consciousness
into other beings was his power all along."

"Without realizing anything, I was given my mission of
\"The ARKS Revival\", and pressed on with my experiments."
"The ARKS Revival to combat the Starless.."
"The prediction that the Starless would return in 500 years..."

"At this point, I'm not sure to what degree
those thoughts are because of Vael's influence."

"But I believe that my hostility towards the
Starless is indeed a product of my own mind."

"As a result, however, I fear I've been practically
dancing in the palm of Vael's hand all this time."
"What is Vael going to do next?"
"So Vael's target is Halpha?"

"There is no doubt that this place has the largest
amount of highly Photon-sensitive people."
"Make no mistake, Vael will be back."
"There's no doubt about that."

"Right now, this place has the largest
amount of highly Photon-sensitive people."

"Right now, Vael is gathering power
in a separate dimension."

"Using the 4th clone as a vessel, he
will perfect its transformation."
"He should be appearing any moment now..."
"Vael is extremely powerful."
"However, you needn't fret."
"Currently, the strongest person amongst the ARKS is you, 909..."
"No... Guardian."
"You have grown even stronger since we last fought."
"And your companions have grown stronger as well, as if in response to your growth."
"You are all the very definition of true ARKS."
"Together, you are surely capable of defeating Vael."
"...It seems my time has come."
"Zephetto..."
"What is it, Aina?"
"...Thank you."
"Don't you think I'm undeserving of those words...?"
"I don't."
"You've certainly caused us a great deal of sorrow and tragedy."
"I will never forgive you for that."
"But, as a result, we now have the strength to fight our true enemy."
"That's why I'm thanking you."
"You're unforgivable... But I forgive you."
"Aina..."
"...People of Halpha."
"I am truly sorry."
"Please, allow me to give you my final request."
"...Take care of this world."
"Zephetto's consciousness has vanished from me completely."
"...He really just left... yet again, without letting anyone get a word in..."
"...What a selfish person."
"The selfish, lonely governor of the Resurgent ARKS..."
